game.name: Volcano Ride
game.description:
In the Volcano Ride that is one of the most popular bikes racing game is being played by the most of the racing game enthusiast with great passion and zeal. The simulated environment of this multilevel game is kept around the volcanic mountains, where, player has to seek to complete his mission by crossing over the different difficulties in form of boulders and gorges on his way of riding the bike successfully in this free online bike racing game.

The entire game of Volcano Ride bike racing is divided into 12 different levels and with every successive level, the difficulty in the game keeps on rising as difficulties of the online racing games get added with more and more problem for a biker. Any miss-happening on the part of biker will lead you only too crashing on the hot fuming lava. So, there should be a perfect and natural balance of speed and jumping to reach at the end of the every stage of the game.

In order to make this game far easier and systematic for a biker in this free online racing game for boys at a very start of the game, the option to choose the best bike at a very start of the game are offered. There are rewards and score points at the end of every game so an online biker could upgrade himself for the upcoming levels of this biking game.

The controls in the game are being adjusted with the help of arrow keys of acceleration and movements whereas spacebar is offered for jumping. For nitro Z key should be pressed on.

game.metaDesc: Enjoy the thrill and excitement of online bike racing with Volcano Ride, one of the most popular online racing games in a multilevel gaming environment.
